```{r setup, include=FALSE}
pacman::p_load(
  tidyverse,
  openalexR,
  readxl,
  nplyr,
  arrow
)
```

```{r}
db = list()
```


```{r}
journals <- read_excel("Area13.xlsx") %>%
  filter(`13/D3` %>% str_detect("A")) %>%
  select(TITOLO,ISSN) %>%
  mutate(ISSN = ISSN %>% str_replace("â€","-"))
```


```{r}
oa_fetch(
  entity = "venues",
  issn = journals %>% pull(ISSN),
) -> db$journals
```

```{r}
db$journals %>%
  filter(!is.na(x_concepts)) %>%
  mutate(x_concepts = map(x_concepts,
                          ~select(.x,
                                  c("display_name",
                                    "score",
                                    "level")))
         ) %>%
  select(display_name, x_concepts) %>%
  unnest(x_concepts,
         names_sep = "_") %>%
  rename(Concept = x_concepts_display_name,
         Score = x_concepts_score,
         Level = x_concepts_level) -> db$joun_conc

db$joun_conc %>%
  summarise(Score = sum(Score),
            .by = c("Concept", "Level")
            ) %>%
  arrange(Score) -> db$concepts
```

```{r}
db$journals %>%
  filter(!is.na(x_concepts)) %>%
  mutate(x_concepts = map(x_concepts,
                          ~select(.x,
                                  c("display_name",
                                    "score",
                                    "level")))
         ) %>%
  select(display_name, x_concepts) %>%
  unnest_wider(x_concepts,
         names_sep = "_") %>%
  select(
    Journal = display_name,
    Concepts = x_concepts_display_name,
         ) %>%
  hoist(Concepts) -> db$journ_conc_ext

filter(db$journals,
       display_name %in%
         (db$journ_conc_ext %>%
         mutate(Concepts =
                  str_extract(Concepts,
                              "^[^,]*(?:,[^,]*){0,1}")) %>%
         filter(Concepts %>%
                  str_detect(
                  c(                    "Demog|Sociol|Social|Polit|Polic|Cultu|Psych|Popul|Crim|Educ|Geoga|Evalu")
             )) %>%
           mutate(Concepts =
                  str_extract(Concepts,
                              "^[^,]*(?:,[^,]*){0}")) %>%
           filter(
             !(str_detect(Concepts, "Economics") &
               !str_detect(Journal, "Demog|Sociol|Social|Polic|Cultu|Psych|Popul|Crim|Educ|Geoga|Evalu"))) %>%
         pull(Journal)
         )) %>%
  distinct() -> db$journ_selection

```

```{r}
oa_fetch(
  entity = "works",
  primary_location.source.id = db$journ_selection$id,
  publication_year = c(2018:2023)
) -> db$works

db$works %>%
  filter(!is.na(author)) %>%
  transmute(id,
         journal = so,
         title = display_name,
         author,
         publication_date,
         year = publication_year,
         references = referenced_works,
         cited_by_count,
         counts_by_year,
         so_id,
         concepts
         ) -> db$works
```


EDGELIST

```{r}
db$works %>%
  unnest(references) %>%
  transmute(from = id,
            to = references,
            from_j = journal) %>%
  filter(to %in% db$works$id) %>%
  left_join(.,db$works %>% select(to_j = journal,id),
            by = c("to" = "id")
            )-> edgelist
```

NODELISTS AND REDUCTION


```{r}
c(edgelist$from,edgelist$to) %>% unique() -> p_nodelist
c(edgelist$from_j,edgelist$to_j) %>% unique() -> j_nodelist

db$works <- db$works %>%
  filter(db$works$id %in% p_nodelist)
```
International Authors

```{r}
db$works %>% unnest(author) -> db$authors

db$authors %>%
  summarise(
    score = sum(cited_by_count)/n(),
    .by = c(au_display_name,
            institution_country_code,
            institution_id)
    ) %>% nrow()

db$authors %>%
  filter(au_display_name == "Rob Law") %>% View()
```
Italians

```{r}
db$authors %>%
  filter(institution_country_code == "IT") -> db$authors_ITA

db$authors_ITA$id %>% unique() %>% length()
db$authors_ITA$journal %>% unique() %>% length()

db$authors_ITA %>%
  summarise(
    n = n(),
    .by = c(au_display_name)
    ) %>% arrange(-n) %>%
  head(20)
```
